long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Combat Online is shooting game. Youâ€™ll then be tasked with getting as many points for your team as possible. Use multiple weapons to gun down your opponents. You can use pistols, machine guns, sniper rifles and many other weapons! There will also be a multitude of maps to choose from. The game has great graphics and simple gameplay. So jump right into it and get your team some points!
